description:
Finn comes out of the tailor in a good mood, dressed in his new custom-made suit. But something rains on his parade: A young man gets kidnapped right in front of his eyes. Finn succeeds in rescuing him using Neo New Nambu, but is taken aback by the young man`s attitude. He`s bossy and rude, looking down on Finn. But the kidnappers continue to come after this young man, and they seem to have their reasons...
Source: crunchyroll
